bibl.title: Phasing out LRA 7 Amphorae in Favor of New Wine Containers: Preliminary Remarks Based on Finds from Excavations in Naqlun.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Presents a tentative typology of the containers from the Islamic period and proposes a provisional study of the liquid goods transported in them. - Pp. 131-133: Appendix 1. Calculation of specific gravity of LRA containers; - 133-134: Appendix 2. The most and the least ""economic"" examples of LRA 7 amphorae from five archaeological sites (6th-7th century). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Tomasz Górecki, Phasing out LRA 7 Amphorae in Favor of New Wine Containers: Preliminary Remarks Based on Finds from Excavations in Naqlun.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 113-137, 2 tabl., 3 figg.

Presents a tentative typology of the containers from the Islamic period and proposes a provisional study of the liquid goods transported in them. - Pp. 131-133: Appendix 1. Calculation of specific gravity of LRA containers; - 133-134: Appendix 2. The most and the least ""economic"" examples of LRA 7 amphorae from five archaeological sites (6th-7th century). - Avec résumé en anglais.
